titleStmt.title: An exposition on the Ten Commandments with other sermons. By the Right Reverend Father in God, Ezekiel, late Lord Bishop of London-Derry.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Ezekiel, 1634-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nathanael Ranew, at the Kings-Arms, Jonathan Robinson, at the Golden Lyon, and John Wyat, at the Rose in St Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "An exposition upon the Sixth Commandment" begins new pagination; register is continuous.
Advertisement on verso of final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
